WidgetFactory
public static enum WidgetFactory.TableFlags
extends java.lang.Enum<WidgetFactory.TableFlags>

Provides flags that control various features of a table

Since:
2008.b

Enum Constant Summary

          Disable changing the width of columns
HIDE_COLUMN_TYPE_ICON
          Hide type icon of table column in table header
HIDE_DISABLED_BGCOLOR
          Hide the disabled background color for disabled columns
HIDE_HEADER
          Hide the column headers of the table
HIDE_INDEX
          Hide index column
HIDE_LINES
          Hide the lines between the table rows
SINGLE_ROW_SELECTION
          Only allow single row selection
